text: I have found it advisable not to give too much heed to what people say when I am trying to accomplish something of consequence. Invariably they proclaim it can't be done. I deem that the very best time to make the effort.
author: Calvin Coolidge

text: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

text: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
author: George Allen, Sr.

text: The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
author: Josh Billings

text: If the United Nations once admits that international disputes can be settled by using force, then we will have destroyed the foundation of the organization and our best hope of establishing a world order.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
